features: Compatibility - This refill is compatible with Quickie's automatic sponge mop
Universal - also compatible w/ other brand's mops 6.625" spacing between bolts
Versatile - 9" Wide head has scuff remover for ground in dirt and debris
Scrubber Strip - includes scrubbing power strip for tough grime on floors
Super Absorbent - poly foam sponge head rapidly absorbs and cleans effectively.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 500 Brushes -Toilet Bowl Brush w/Cleaner Dispensing Brush Head LOLA ROLA Sticky Mop-Jumbo 3.5" Wide Diameter Giant Floor Lint Roller Swedish Dishcloths for Kitchen On a Roll Lola Products Whisk Broom- Handheld Brush- Whisks Away Dirt & Dust Plastic Mesh Scourers USES BATHROOM CARPET, HARDWOOD & TILE FLOORS- PET HAIR ALL AROUND THE HOUSE- KITCHEN, BATHROOM- INDOORS & OUTDOORS AUTO, GENERAL OUTDOORS CLEANING SCOURING DISHES, POTS, PANS, ETC... WHAT'S INCLUDED DURABLE HANDLE, 2 BRUSH HEADS, NO-SLIP CADDY, 5 BLUE CLEANSER TABLETS 4 SECTION HANDLE, 30 SHEET STICKY ROLL, ROLLER HEAD 30 SUPER SIZE SHEETS ON A ROLL COMFORT HANDLE, DURABLE POLY BRISTLES 3 PACK OR 36 PACK OF SCOURERS SIZE 5.75"(W) X 16"(H) 53.5"(H) X 9"(W)- 3.5" DIA. ROLL EXTRA LARGE- 10.625"(H) X 9.75"(W) SHEETS 9.5"(H) X 4.5"(W) 3.75"(W) X 1.25"(H) +/- WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS THINK 4.5 STARS 4.3 STARS 4.5 STARS 4.4 STARS 4.4 STARS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I found them at Amazon
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for these refill mop heads for a while. I almost gave up but my friends at Amazonhad this item and they were reasonably priced. Thank you Amazon for coming thru.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my O'Cedar butterfly mop handle
reviews.reviewText: Found a mop hear from O Cedar, but they wanted $25. Went with this mop and it fit the mop handle just fine. The sponge is not a heavy duty as the original mop head, but it works. Ordered two more as bachups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was not fit for purposes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper Than Quickie REfill
reviews.reviewText: This refill is a lot cheaper than a quickie S mop refill. I found that you have to futz with it on a wood floor or it will just stick and not mop. Otherwise, it is a pretty good sponge mop refrill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice replacement mop head
reviews.reviewText: These are about all you can expect for a mop head. They didn't actually work for me because I made a mistake and didnt pay attention to the size. We still use them but just with our hands for spot cleaning. They arrive well packaged and work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very disappointed with the quality
reviews.reviewText: I used this mop head once on my butterfly mop. It didn’t wring out very well and I had to squeeze it by hand in order not to leave puddles on the floor. But the bigger disappointment is that the sponge detached from the head in the first hour of use. What a waste of money. I would give this zero stars, if that were possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Necessary To Know- This Fits Quickie Mop that requires S Refill PERFECTLY. I bought this because I found a measurement for the spacing of the screw mounts and it fit perfectly on my Quickie floor mop. The sponge looks good and so do the attached Scrubbers. All considered, this is Great and Comparable to the NameBrand replacement at about Half The Price. I'll be using these from now on. Looks like it might even outlast my old ones, will have to wait and see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The sponge part is an artificial sponge. It did not pick up all the dirty water. At the end of each stroke on the floor, there was a mark of some of the dirty water that was not all absorbed. I had to compensate by carefully lightening-up pressure at the end of each mop stroke. When I used a Quickie mop replacement, that was real sponge and it absorbed all the dirty water. It left no mark at the end of the stroke and was easier to use.The one positive of the Lola was the scrubbing edges on the front of the mop. But that was not enough to compensate for the poor mopping - in my opinion.
